description: Customer age must be within policy min_age and max_age
Customer risk_score must be within policy risk_score_min and risk_score_max
If policy smoker_allowed is False, customer.smoker must be False
If customer has preexisting condition, ensure policy preexisting_wait_months is acceptable
policy premium_monthly must be <= customer preference budget_monthly
policy category should match customer preferred_category unless no matches found, then suggest nearest
policy sum_insured must be >= customer preference min_sum_insured when applicable
